paragraphs.text:
%md

### DISCLAIMER

This was developed purely after hours because the creators have no life.

### README

The point of this rating system is:

 - to encourage greater diversity of play between players - i.e. to encourage players to play against people they would not normally.
 - to help find players of similar levels

#### Rating Rules:

 - No cheating! This is an honour system, anyone can hack it, just don't (unless you are 12, then go ahead)
 - Try to verbally agree prior to play that a game is rated

#### Ping Pong Rules

 - When serving, you must throw the ball up at least 6 inches roughly vertically before striking the ball.
 - When serving, you must hold the ball in an open palm behind the table edge and above it before throwing it up.
 - When serving, when you strike the ball, it must be behind the table edge.
 - Players may not put free hand on the playing surface during a rally. Doing so results in losing the point.
 - In case of a player committing an accidental volley, the point goes to said player only if the ball was out of play (i.e. passed the table's borders) at the time.
 - No biting
 - The obvious ones

result.msg:
DISCLAIMER

This was developed purely after hours because the creators have no life.

README

The point of this rating system is:

  • to encourage greater diversity of play between players - i.e. to encourage players to play against people they would not normally.
  • to help find players of similar levels

Rating Rules:

  • No cheating! This is an honour system, anyone can hack it, just don't (unless you are 12, then go ahead)
  • Try to verbally agree prior to play that a game is rated

Ping Pong Rules

  • When serving, you must throw the ball up at least 6 inches roughly vertically before striking the ball.
  • When serving, you must hold the ball in an open palm behind the table edge and above it before throwing it up.
  • When serving, when you strike the ball, it must be behind the table edge.
  • Players may not put free hand on the playing surface during a rally. Doing so results in losing the point.
  • In case of a player committing an accidental volley, the point goes to said player only if the ball was out of play (i.e. passed the table's borders) at the time.
  • No biting
  • The obvious ones

paragraphs.title: Add Players
Run Me After Adding a Player
paragraphs.text:
val playersMenuOptions = getPlayerList.toArray.map(name => DropDownMenu(name, name))
z.angularBind("myOptions", playersMenuOptions)
z.angularBind("selectedOptionWinner", Array(DropDownMenu("NOT SELECTED", "NOT SELECTED")))
z.angularBind("selectedOptionLoser", Array(DropDownMenu("NOT SELECTED", "NOT SELECTED")))

result.msg: playersMenuOptions: Array[DropDownMenu] = Array(DropDownMenu(NOT SELECTED,NOT SELECTED), DropDownMenu(foo.bar,foo.bar))

paragraphs.title: Enter Game Players
paragraphs.text:
%angular 
<label>THE MIGHTY WINNER:</label><select name="mySelectWinner" style="background-color:transparent" ng-options="opt.id as opt.label for opt in myOptions" ng-model="selectedOptionWinner"></select>
<label>THE PATHETIC WORTHLESS LOSER:</label><select name="mySelectLoser" style="background-color:transparent" ng-options="opt.id as opt.label for opt in myOptions" ng-model="selectedOptionLoser"></select>

result.msg:
<label>THE MIGHTY WINNER:</label><select name="mySelectWinner" style="background-color:transparent" ng-options="opt.id as opt.label for opt in myOptions" ng-model="selectedOptionWinner"></select>
<label>THE PATHETIC WORTHLESS LOSER:</label><select name="mySelectLoser" style="background-color:transparent" ng-options="opt.id as opt.label for opt in myOptions" ng-model="selectedOptionLoser"></select>

paragraphs.title: Run Me After Entering Game Players
paragraphs.text:
reset()
load()
val winner = z.angular("selectedOptionWinner").toString
val loser = z.angular("selectedOptionLoser").toString
if (winner == null || loser == null || winner == "" || loser == "" || winner == "NOT SELECTED" || loser == "NOT SELECTED" || winner.contains("DropDownMenu") || loser.contains("DropDownMenu")) {
  println(".")
  println("UTS ERROR: User too stupid")
} else {
    addGame(winner, loser)
    save()
    println("SUCCESS! Well done you added a game, run the Rankings cell to see how crap you are!")
    println("Most recent 10 games:")
    getGameLogPretty.takeRight(10).foreach(println)
}
